in the case of Mariko, the Python interpreter can deduce that the subject is from Tokyo based on the false argument of city_london and city_mumbai. In statistics, this concept is known as multi-collinearity and describes the ability to predict a variable based on the value of other variables

pd.get_dummies to perform One-hot-encoding

To remove expendable columns in Python, we can add the parameter drop_first=True, which removes the first column for each variable.
